channel.title: [delta] dark bow glitch [/delta]
channel.description:
just now i was informed of a glitch involving dark bow
if your standing in the wild, and you attack another player, it will damage them
anyone no the fix for this? i think i found it not sure tho, mite fuk up something so help if u can ;)
